name: Handsome Jim Muscle
description:
A Game made for the Kongregate Game Jam.

You lost it, but now your trying to find it!

You are looking for "it", can you find it?

Evade a factory full of thugs and find "it".

Use your attractiveness to seduce boxes, and make them smash the thugs!

Full Voice acting, Full Sound Effect,
Full Handsomeness!

Use WASD to move, click left mouse button to attract, reach the blue exit to win the level

Press M to mute

Press Zero to clear save data

Game Auto Saves

Play Web version here : http://www.kongregate.com/games/moraleszez/handsome-jim-muscle
